text: Chi Chi LaRue (born Larry David Paciotti on November 8, 1959) is an American movie director of gay, bisexual, and straight pornography. He was born in Hibbing, Minnesota. He is best known in his drag name, Chi Chi LaRue. He has also directed under the names Lawrence David and Taylor Hudson. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American LGBT sex industry people Category:American movie directors Category:Drag queens Category:LGBT directors Category:People from Hibbing, Minnesota Category:Pornographic movie directors Category:AVN Award winners
title: Chi Chi LaRue
